sqlMap.select: SELECT /*FSMA0020.SEARCH00.품목분류 관리 조회 처리*/ A.CLSF_CODE /*품목분류코드*/ ,A.CLSF_NAME /*품목분류명*/ ,A.CLSF_LEVE /*폼목분류레벨*/ ,A.ASCL_CODE /*자산분류코드*/ ,'['||(SF_GET_COMMNAME('ASST_GUBN', B.ASST_GUBN)||'] ') || B.ASCL_NAME AS ASCL_NAME /* 자산분류명칭*/ ,A.SORT_ORDR /*정렬순서*/ ,A.USEX_YSNO /*사용여부*/ ,A.BEFO_CLSF /*이전분류코드*/ ,A.UPXX_CLSF /*상의품목코드*/ ,SF_GET_CLSFMNAME(A.UPXX_CLSF) AS UPXX_NAME FROM FS_CLSFXM A /*[품목분류]*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN FS_ASCLXM B ON A.ASCL_CODE = B.ASCL_CODE WHERE A.CLSF_CODE LIKE #CLSF_CODE# || '%' ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDR

SELECT /*FSMA0020.SEARCH01.트리뷰 조회 */ CLSF_CODE /*품목분류코드*/ ,CLSF_NAME /*품목분류명*/ ,CLSF_LEVE /*폼목분류레벨*/ ,ASCL_CODE /*자산분류코드*/ ,SORT_ORDR /*정렬순서*/ ,USEX_YSNO /*사용여부*/ ,DECODE (CLSF_LEVE, '', '0', '3') AS IMAG_IDXX ,'1' AS EXTE_IMAG ,'2' AS CLOS_IMAG FROM FS_CLSFXM /*[품목분류]*/ WHERE 1=1 /* USEX_YSNO = '1' */ ORDER BY SORT_ORDR, CLSF_CODE
sqlMap.insert: /*FSMA0020.SAVE00.품목분류 관리 저장 처리*//*[품목분류]*/ INSERT INTO FS_CLSFXM ( CLSF_CODE /*품목분류코드*/ ,CLSF_NAME /*품목분류명*/ ,CLSF_LEVE /*폼목분류레벨*/ ,ASCL_CODE /*자산분류코드*/ ,SORT_ORDR /*정렬순서*/ ,USEX_YSNO /*사용여부*/ ,BEFO_CLSF /*이전분류코드*/ ,INST_DATE /*등록일시*/ ,INST_USID /*등록자*/ ,UPDT_DATE /*수정일시*/ ,UPDT_USID /*수정자*/ ,UPXX_CLSF /*상위분류코드*/ ) VALUES ( #CLSF_CODE# ,#CLSF_NAME# ,#CLSF_LEVE# ,CASE WHEN #CLSF_LEVE# = '1' THEN TO_NCHAR(#ASCL_CODE#) ELSE (SELECT DISTINCT ASCL_CODE FROM FS_CLSFXM WHERE CLSF_LEVE = '1' AND SUBSTR(CLSF_CODE, 1, 2) = SUBSTR(#CLSF_CODE#, 1, 2)) END ,#SORT_ORDR# ,#USEX_YSNO# ,#BEFO_CLSF# ,SYSDATE ,#INST_USID# ,SYSDATE ,#UPDT_USID# ,#UPXX_CLSF# )
